body_html:
@rmlarsen I add and pass these tests. I also add some explanation of these Cuda{2D,3D,}LaunchConfig into cuda_kernel_helper.h.

The test is a .cu.cc file. To build it, I have to add something to tensorflow.bzl. I'm not sure if I'm doing the correct thing for this change.

body:
@rmlarsen I add and pass these tests. I also add some explanation of these `Cuda{2D,3D,}LaunchConfig` into `cuda_kernel_helper.h`. 

The test is a `.cu.cc` file. To build it, I have to add something to `tensorflow.bzl`. I'm not sure if I'm doing the correct thing for this change.
